name: Teddy's Tale
description:
Embark on a whimsical journey as an adorable teddy bear trying to reach its owner in this quirky mix of puzzle, platforming and stealth in this tale of family, self growth and human connections.

Teddy's Tale is a 3D single player video game mixing puzzle, platforming and stealth. Play as a teddy bear trying to reach the second floor of its home to find its owner, 6 year old May. But beware! You do not want to be seen moving around by May's mom. Push and pull objects around, hide from the mom and see the world from a whole different perspective. Experience the tale of a teddy bear learning about family, self growth and human connections.

There is nothing more powerful than a teddy bear full of love and determination!

Playthrough of the game for Gotland Game Conference 2022

Credits:
